pageContext.claim: “The only reason the U.S. has reported one million cases of CoronaVirus is that our Testing is sooo much better than any other country in the World. Other countries are way behind us in Testing, and therefore show far fewer cases!”
pageContext.analysis: No, the main reason is that the virus was spreading. Another contributing cause was U.S. officials' halting response during critical early weeks. Some countries for months had a higher per capita testing rate than the United States.
